MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetViewNames() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an array of names representing named views in the data source.
Docs.returns: This implementation always returns an empty string array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Named views are not implemented in this data source designer. Views are retrieved based on an XPath query rather than name.

Docs.param: The object that raised the event.
A object containing information about the event.
Docs.summary: Called when the associated component changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> also calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method, which raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event, and also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event.
